key.name: org.pentaho.reporting.engine.classic.core.modules.output.table.html.LinksInheritStyle
key.description: Add inherited style for links. This removes the HTML specific styling on links.

key.name: org.pentaho.reporting.engine.classic.core.modules.output.table.html.AssumeOverflowX
key.description:
Indicates if the reporting engine should truncate the data to make it fit in the defined area (true) or if the engine will expect the viewer to truncate the data to the appropriate size (false) when generating HTML output.
The default value is TRUE.

key.name: org.pentaho.reporting.engine.classic.core.modules.output.table.html.AssumeOverflowY
key.description:
Indicates if the reporting engine should truncate the data to make it fit in the defined area (false) or if the engine will expect the viewer to truncate the data to the appropriate size (true) when generating HTML output.
The default value is false.

key.name: org.pentaho.reporting.engine.classic.core.modules.output.table.html.Author
key.description: Defines a author for generated HTML documents.

key.name: org.pentaho.reporting.engine.classic.core.modules.output.table.html.BodyFragment
key.description: Defines whether to define a body fragment only. This removes the header and body tags and makes it easy to include the generated content in own pages.

key.name: org.pentaho.reporting.engine.classic.core.modules.output.table.html.CopyExternalImages
key.description: Defines, whether images referenced by an HTTP, HTTPS or FTP URL are copied to the output or included directly.

key.name: org.pentaho.reporting.engine.classic.core.modules.output.table.html.DeviceResolution
key.description: Adjusts the resultion of the images embedded in the HTML files. By default we use 96 DPI, which is the common default among all browsers.

key.name: org.pentaho.reporting.engine.classic.core.modules.output.table.html.EmptyCellsUseCSS
key.description:
Defines, whether empty cells will be controled using CSS. If this is set to true, the Table get the style property "empty-cells: show" assigned and the otherwise required no-break-space entites will no longer be generated.
The Internet-Explorer is not able to use correct CSS2 yet - they never obeyed to standards anyway, so that's no surprise that this defaults to "false"..

key.name: org.pentaho.reporting.engine.classic.core.modules.output.table.html.Encoding
key.description: Defines the document encoding. If undefined, it defaults to the platforms default encoding.

key.name: org.pentaho.reporting.engine.classic.core.modules.output.table.html.ExternalStyle
key.description:
Defines whether the report processing should generate external stylesheet files.
If disabled, then the style information will be added as inline-stylesheet in the header of the generated file. If this option is enabled the engine will be able to directly stream the generated content to the output repository.
Enabling external stylesheet files also enables the streaming mode, so that the generated content is written to disk immediately. However, as the reference to the CSS file will be sent to the browser before the full style is known, this will lead to subtle rendering errors when used to stream the page to the browser in web-environments.

key.name: org.pentaho.reporting.engine.classic.core.modules.output.table.html.ForceBufferedWriting
key.description:
This setting can be used to fully disable the direct streaming of the generated content. All generated content will be held in memory until the report processing has been finished. Only if the report processing finishes successfully, the generated HTML content is written.
This can be necessary in Web-Environments where the user's browser would try to read the CSS file before the stylesheet has been fully generated.
Buffering the content may lead to OutOfMemory-Errors if the generated content is very large. However, most browsers have troubles rendering files that are larger than 20MB, therefore the browser usually fails first.

key.name: org.pentaho.reporting.engine.classic.core.modules.output.table.html.InlineStyles
key.description:
This setting can be used to fully disable the generation of stylesheets. All style-information will be added directly to the generated elements. The resulting content will be larger, but the output can be streamed directly to the repository without using the content-buffering.
Inline styles are safe for streaming the content in Web-Applications, as the browser will not be tricked into accessing stylesheets before the style has been fully computed.
If "BodyFragmentCreation" is enabled, the engine always generates inline styles.

key.name: org.pentaho.reporting.engine.classic.core.modules.output.table.html.Module
key.description: A module definition. Please do not edit this entry.

key.name: org.pentaho.reporting.engine.classic.core.modules.output.table.html.ProportionalColumnWidths
key.description: Enables the use of proportional column widths instead of static ones. The resulting table will have a width of 100% and the columns will have the proportional equivalent of their static widths as width.

key.name: org.pentaho.reporting.engine.classic.core.modules.output.table.html.SafariLengthHack
key.description: Defines, whether the Safari compatibility mode is enabled. Safari cannot parse CSS-lengths with fractions, and thus fails to bring borders in.

key.name: org.pentaho.reporting.engine.classic.core.modules.output.table.html.ShapeAsContent
key.description: Defines, whether Shape-content that is not one of the recognized background shapes will be printed as image. If set to false, the content will be removed, if set to true, the content ends up as image.

key.name: org.pentaho.reporting.engine.classic.core.modules.output.table.html.UseTableLayoutFixed
key.description: Defines whether the generated tables should have the "table-layout:fixed" style defined. This is safe to set to true and should be set to false only if something really weird happens in your browser.

key.name: org.pentaho.reporting.engine.classic.core.modules.output.table.html.UseWhitespacePreWrap
key.description: Defines whether the reporting engine should generate "whitespace-collapse: pre-line" styles instead of "whitespace-collapse: pre" styles. This makes lines breakable so that they flow softly. See http://www.quirksmode.org/css/whitespace.html for details.

key.name: org.pentaho.reporting.engine.classic.core.modules.output.table.html.SheetNameClass
key.description: A space separated list of additional CSS-Classnames that should be applied to all sheetname sections generated during the report processing. This property can be used to link the generated report into a existing CSS-based layout.

key.name: org.pentaho.reporting.engine.classic.core.modules.output.table.html.StyleClass
key.description: A space separated list of additional CSS-Classnames that should be applied to all tables generated during the report processing. This property can be used to link the generated report into a existing CSS-based layout.

key.name: org.pentaho.reporting.engine.classic.core.modules.output.table.html.TableRowBorderDefinition
key.description: Defines, whether table rows should carry a border definition (in addition to the cell definitions). This is a workaround for a layout bug in the Mozilla browser family.

key.name: org.pentaho.reporting.engine.classic.core.modules.output.table.html.Title
key.description: Defines the default title for generated HTML documents.

key.name: org.pentaho.reporting.engine.classic.core.modules.output.table.html.default.html
key.description: An internal property for the XML support. Do not edit this.

key.name: org.pentaho.reporting.engine.classic.core.modules.output.table.html.namespace.html
key.description: A internal configuration that controls an XML-Generator. Do not edit.

key.description: A internal configuration that controls an XML-Generator. Do not edit.

key.description: A internal configuration that controls an XML-Generator. Do not edit.

key.description: A internal configuration that controls an XML-Generator. Do not edit.

key.description: A internal configuration that controls an XML-Generator. Do not edit.

key.name: org.pentaho.reporting.engine.classic.core.modules.output.table.html.RotatedTextAsImages
key.description: Defines, whether the rotated text should be exported as images in HTML.
